snippet.title: Zoda's Revenge: StarTropics II (NES) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A playthrough of Nintendo's 1994 NES game, Zoda's Revenge: StarTropics II.

For a full review, screenshot gallery, and soundtrack, check out my write-up at http://www.nintendocomplete.com/zodas-revenge-star-tropics-ii/

Star Tropics II: Zoda’s Revenge shares many traits with StarTropics, and unfortunately it suffers badly for the comparison. Though it is an entertaining game that requires both quick reflexes and logical thinking, it feels like a cheap rehash, bankrupt of innovation or creativity; it comes across as a weak attempt to wring a little more money out of the NES in its twilight years. It’s worth a play for fans of StarTropics – just don’t expect to be blown away by it.

I will say though that Chapter 9 is one of the coolest "throw-backs" I've ever seen in a game. It was easily my favorite part. Until the inane boss-rush, that is. 
_________
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!

Visit for the latest updates!
